includedAssets.title: Broken

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: With the curse broken and their memories restored, the residents of Storybrooke must face up to new threats from both Fairy-tale Land and the human world. Second season of the hit fantasy drama starring Jennifer Morrison.

includedIn.title: Once Upon A Time
includedIn.synopsis: After her long-lost son suddenly reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a mysterious town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters. There she must find her parents, defeat a wicked queen and break a dark curse.
